mapper.select: SELECT l4.tagID AS tagID, l4.animalType AS animalType, l4.age AS age, l1.diet AS diet, l4.weight AS weight, l4.lastFed AS lastFed, l3.harvestable AS harvestable, l4.lastViolatedForHarvestedGoods AS lastViolatedForHarvestedGoods, FROM LIVESTOCK_1 l1, LIVESTOCK_3 l3, LIVESTOCK_4 l4 WHERE l4.animalType = l3.animalType AND l4.animalType = l1.animalType AND l4.age = l3.age AND l4.weight = l1.weight and tagID = #{id} ORDER BY l4.tagId
SELECT id as id, first_name as firstName, last_name as lastName, email, password, username from people order by id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO livestock (tagID, animalType, age, diet, weight, lastFed, harvestable, lastViolatedForHarvestedGoods) VALUES (#{tagID}, #{animalType}, #{age}, #{diet}, #{weight}, #{lastFed}, #{harvestable}, #{lastViolatedForHarvestedGoods})
